div.p: To better illustrate the Outcome Criteria Framework, this guide includes integrated examples that show FHIR resources (e.g. Measure, PlanDefinition, ActivityDefinition, ResearchDefinition, ResearchElementDefinition) along with their associated FHIR Libraries and CQL libraries.

ul.li: Depression example: AHRQ OMF depresion outcome measures, formally represented per the framework described in this Implementation Guide
